title: Renovated 2 Bed in Amazing Downtown Skokie Location! Parking Avail!
posting_body: ['Available 9/1!', 'Email showing requests.', 'Provide your name, phone number and email address and\u202fa leasing agent will reach out', 'Spacious and sunny 2nd floor unit located in the heart of downtown Skokie walking distance to shopping, restaurants, and metra!', 'Features:', '-Updated kitchen', '-Separate dining room', '-Large bedrooms', '-Plenty of closet space', '-Tons of natural light', '-AC available', '-Laundry on-Site', '-Storage available (based on availability)', '-Off street parking available to rent for $25/month', '-Street parking with a Skokie village permit', '-Small pets OK (cats & dogs up to 40lbs, breed restrictions with $25/mo pet rent)', '-Responsive maintenance team', '*Images are of exact or very similar unit on site.', 'Terms:', '$250 per Occupant Non-Refundable Move-In Fee', 'No Security Deposit', 'Heat &water included', 'General Credit and Income Requirements:', '-650+ credit score', '-Gross monthly income should be at lease 3x the rent', '(There are some exceptions to these requirements, such as being a full time student and having a cosigner.)', 'Location:', '-Superb downtown Skokie location - steps to shops, restaurants, shopping, metra!', '-Walking distance to Skokie CTA Yellow Line', '-Walking distance to bus routes', '-Easy access to I-94', "-Walking distance to Village Green, Library, North Shore Center for the Performing Arts, Skokie Farmer's Market, Skokie Valley Trail, & Oakton Park", '-Short drive to Skokie Sports Park, Water Park, Camps, Pooch Park, Emily Oaks Nature Center, Golf Course, Tennis Parks and so much more!', 'Highly rated schools including Montessori School, Madison Elementary, Thomas Edison Elementary, Lincoln Junior High and Niles West High School', "Don't miss this!", 'Meltzer Real Estate\u202fLLC', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'No Smoking']
